Air In Demo Mode

  • By Artem V. Shamsutdinov
  • June 4th, 2020

As discussed previously Airport will first run as a Cordova App. Because of limitations on background apps all Air apps will run in WebView of the Airport app itself (for now). However that requires to user to first install Airport, even if all they want to do is try it. So there will be an additional mode for Airport with
